entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
